DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether participation Internet-based intervention help improve medication use .
DOC.criteria: Any male female 18 year old , fill prescription oral medication hypertension , high cholesterol , diabetes , depression Downtown Health Plaza , Piedmont Plaza , Cancer Center Pharmacies .
